subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: जैसा राजस्थान की राजधानी हुई पहले जैपुर?
explanation_en: Before Jaipur became the capital of Rajasthan, Ajmer was the capital.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी हुई जैपुर के बाद, Ajmer राजधानी हुई।
